## GroupBDTO class

Backend DTO for user. Based on [GroupModel](./clm-core.groupmodel.md) The instance [groupBDTOInstance](./clm-core.groupbdtoinstance.md) is provided. Uses as default [MariaAdapter](./clm-core.mariaadapter.md) for persistence layer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GroupBDTO extends BaseBackendDTO<GroupModel> 
```
